name: Potato Dungeon
description:
When you searched the dungeon you found few pages from legendary magical book. To find the rest of the book you went to the deepest part of dungeon. Use the previously found cards to get your way to the book. Use WSAD and mouse. To attack opponent choose spell and then click on enemy.

Dungeon crawler/rougelike with dungeon synth music.

Hubert Rzepinski - programming, 3d graphics

Adam Piotrowski - design, music, sound fxs and sprites (yes, potatos)
